item.title: Mix tape music for hurricanes
Wasn't that a mighty storm
item.description: as seen in this excellent NY Daily News article - Galveston had a seawall To keep the water down, But the high tide from the ocean Washed water over the town. Wasn't that a mighty storm! Oh, wasn't that a mighty storm with water! Wasn't that a mighty storm That blew all the people away! Their trumpets gave them warning, "You'd better leave this place." They never thought of leaving Till death looked them in the face.
